description: This file defines a C# interface for user repository operations in the NotesBackend project, providing methods for retrieving users by username or ID and adding new users.

classes.name: IUserRepository
classes.description: An interface defining repository operations related to user persistence, including retrieval and addition of users.

methods.name: GetByUsername
methods.description: Retrieves a User object based on a provided username, returning null if not found.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a User object based on a provided GUID identifier, returning null if not found.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new User object to the repository.
